findings.message: The statement "stealth mode ... inactive at `xa-b-site.pages.dev` (no env var set)" is not provable from repository code and can be wrong at runtime; mark this as an operator-confirmed assumption instead of established evidence.
Evidence line reference is stale (`apps/xa-b/src/app/page.tsx` hero CTA is currently at line 60, not 61); update line refs or use "around line …" wording.
`XA-V2-01` is a staging setup/deploy task, not production deployment planning; this non-goal mapping is incorrect and can mis-scope follow-up work.
The statement “robots tags default to indexable when stealth is off” is incorrect for this codebase. `apps/xa-b/src/app/robots.ts` defaults to `disallow: "/"` unless `XA_ALLOW_INDEXING === "true"`.
Compliance guidance is based on the same incorrect robots assumption; current default behavior already blocks crawlers.
The “Route Map (Complete)” is incomplete: `/collections` exists (`apps/xa-b/src/app/collections/page.tsx`) but is not listed.
It says there are “2 open questions,” but three operator-input questions are listed in the Open section.
